column5: Well the Funeral Service was yesterday and I got to take the Urn to put it in the wall and I had a hard time giving her up.Finally put her in to the spot then did not want to leave. Man it was hard to leave her there.Now on to the legal thing that have to be followed up. Taking another week of work.

A day at at time my friend..... there's no rush.  The daily thoughts and memories will never seem to change, but the tears will turn to smiles at some point in time.  Did you ever get that porch finished for her?? If not that would be my first project.

Kelvin, i really believe that loved ones who go before us, are always with us in our daily lives.I personally `FEEL` my father with me every day. Keep the love for her alive in your heart my friend. You will most  certainly feel her with you in everything you do.  God Bless
My deepest condolenses Kelvin.  Jim
My condolences to you and your family SBK
No rant here my friend. Such will always keep her in your heart.  Painful times to say the least, but you have a lot of close fiends right there with you - even in spirit from miles away.
Cancer is a scourge on the human race too many people are lost to this disease. My deepest sympathies go out to you.
You have my condolences Kelvin. I can't imagine being in your shoes. Makes one sit back and think. Sorry for your lost Kelvin.
Extremely saddened by your loss Kelvin. I'm still struggling to find the appropriate words.
My deepest sympathy on your loss.

Yes Wayne, the front porch was finished in June 3.5 weeks from start and she would sit on it all day and would be waiting there till I pulled into the driveway. I am going to miss that. She said when it was finished she Loved it and appreciated all that I sacrificed to get it done for the summer for her.
Thanks Paul for the Kind Words and I do believe in what you are saying.
Please accept my condolences.

I am so saddened to hear this Kelvin. My deepest sympathies. Things looked so positive for a while there. It was terrible to hear the news in our emails, and now this. Keep strong my friend. My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.
I am very sorry to hear for your loss, remeber the good time when when your sad It somtimes helps.
My Condolences  Snowball
Very sorry to hear this . We feel your hurt .
My heartfelt condolences for your loss.
Sorry to hear this very sad news. Time will take the pain away. The memories will last forever.
I'm so sorry to hear of your loss, my deepest sympathy.
sorry for your loss my prayers are with you and your family during this hard time. Ryan
Sorry for your loss, my condolences to you and your family at this very difficult time
OH My,,, Kelvin, we send our deepest and sincerest condolences to you and your family. If there is anything you need my friend, never hesitate to ask me.
very sorry to hear this
Kelvin, I am so sorry for your loss, my condolences to you and your family...  Maureen
I'm at a loss for words Kelvin. Better days ahead for sure.

Late to the keyboard here Kelvin.. been sitting in Mount Sinai all day with Jen. This explains a dream/nightmare I had last night, but not of whom I thought.  A tough blow and my heart is heavy, but consider she's not suffering anymore.  If you need help with anything, you let me know !  Wayne and Leah
my condolences Kelvin...  let me know if ya need anything buddy
I am saddened for your lose Kelvin. Ensure that memories continue with each day. You will be in our prayers.  Ron...
All our condolences Kelvin,Here's to brighter days and to know she won't suffer ever again...Chuck...
i am very sorry to hear that news,my deepest condoleneces to you sir..
Oh Hell Kelvin I am so sorry to here this.
Oh Kalvin... I am soooo saddened to hear this.  She was a wonderful woman. My deepest condolences to you and your family

I would like to thank every one for the kind words and PM's I have been getting. She was one of a kind and like I said earlier, she was My Sole Mate, My Best Friend & Partner, Beautiful Bride, very personal with other people and always willing to help when She could. Heck she was even involved with an Dog Rescue Group that would take dogs from a Kill Shelter and we would have some here till they found new homes for them.Dame this I am really going to miss her more that I can imagine.Sorry for ranting on. Thanks again to every one  Kelvin
Kelvin- I am so sorry to hear the bad news! Not what I expected at all. What a shock!! Thoughts and prayers are with you my friend.
So sorry to hear of this, There is little I can offer outside of my condolences and prayer.
I'm so sorry to hear this news Kelvin...there are no words right now...  My deepest condolences...
Sorry to hear. If there's anything we can do, don't hesitate to ask!

Got a big knot in my stomach when I read your title.  Kelvin, I am so very sorry to hear this. The second one I've heard of in a week (my sister-in-law lost her mom) that has been taken by this terrible disease. My deepest condolences to you and your family.
Ah, thats not what I wanted to hear...So sorry Kelvin. Stay strong.
sorry for your loss that just sucks
Man, Kelvin Feel your grief.  So sorry.  Cancer is just so  insidious.    My most sincere condolences.
never let go of who she was as a person  My deepest condolences
My condolences, sir. Hope the best for you and your family. Stay strong.
sad news. rejoice and charish the time you had together.  Deepest sympathies
Kelvin, I read this with the deepest regret and sadness. I can imagine no greater loss. My deepest and heartfelt condolences.

So So sorry , wish I had some thing profound to say , Hang in there guy , she has gone on to a better place . I'm sure she will be waiting for you and you will be again joined in heaven ... My prayers go out to you and your family ..

Oh Kelvin, I'm so very sorry to hear this.  I had high hopes she was going to pull through.  Yes, this cancer must be beaten.  Dad had lung cancer, but it was the heart attack that took him, brought on by the lung cancer deteriorating all his internal organs and making them weak.  Our sincerest condolances to you and your family from ours.  Joey and Paul
Cancer touches most every family in one way or another, very sorry to hear the sad news.
Mine and Jeanne's heartfelt condolences to you and your family, Kelvin.
Deepest condolences.  Sorry for your loss.
Celebrate her life Kelvin, I am sure she was a wonderful person and now she has gone to the most wonderful place. Be strong but don't deny the grieving, it is part of the healing process.
Kelvin, I am saddened by your loss. I hope you can find the strength and courage to carry on.
So sorry to here this sad news Kelvin. You have my deepest condolences.
That's a tough one.  Sorry about your loss.

Kelvin, I'm speechless. I don't know that we have ever met in person (perhaps briefly at an event?), but I certainly feel your pain, and after all these years on this board, I feel I do know you. Sounds like a wonderful marriage to a wonderful woman and friend. You have my deepest condolences and will be in my thoughts. Be well.
I feel for your loss I have had people in my life taken from me by cancer.  Be strong and be well   Art
Speechless, My condolences Kelvin
Sorry to hear, my condolences.
Aw man Kelvin, that is not what I wanted to hear.   You truely will be on our thoughts and prayers my friend.
I am very sorry to hear of your loss.
My and my families condolences to you.

Sadly this was not the update I wanted to post Born Nov 15 1954 Passed on Jan 16 2012.. My Sole Mate, My Best friend, Partner & Beautyful Bride passed on after suffering a stroke that took her last breath.. She was everything a person could want as a Friend and I will miss her dearly.  This Cancer has to be beaten..  Enough said
Oh, Kelvin, I am so sorry to hear this. I wish you strength and comfort in the coming days and weeks to follow.
I am so very sorry to hear this, our thoughts and prayers are with you and the family.
My deepest sympathy.  In our thoughts my friend.
I'm so sorry for your loss. You and your family will be in my thoughts and prayers.
Very sorry to hear Kelvin.  My sincerest condolences.
Very deepest sympathies from Barbara and me Kelvin.

My dear friend I am so saddened to hear this news.I know how hard she fought,and how much you supported her fight, and how strong you were for her. Like all the loved ones who go before us, she will be waiting for you with all the love you both shared in this life. My deepest sympathies Kelvin, and my greatest respect for you my friend.  Paul
Kelvin old friend...Maribeth and I send our condolences...
Very sorry to hear of your loss,
So very sorry to hear this news. My condolences to you and your families.
Very sorry to hear this.
Our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.
Sorry to hear about your loss.
Very sorry to hear this, I can't imagine what you're going through.  Deepest condolences.
My condolences go out to you and your family.  May your memories be your comfort.
I am so sorry for your loss
OH no, Kelvin I'm so very sorry to hear this and deepest sympathies from both Diane and myself.  Very very sad.
So sorry to hear that Kelvin. You have Monique and I's sincerest condolences. Your in our thoughts!
Seen the title and thought oh no.  Very sorry to hear of your loss Kelvin. Our prayers are with you and the family. Very very sad news.
Very Sorry To Hear of This News
Very sorry to hear this, my thoughts are with you.  Dan
My most sincere condolences
My condolenses Kelvin.  Very sad new indeed.
My highest condolences to you and your family and every around you
